posts.post_title: WTB Larry Doyle T206 Holding Bat - Diff. backs
posts.post_content:
I'm looking for the Larry Doyle holding bat T206 card with various backs.  I have a few all ready, but would like to know if anyone has others that are thinking about selling.

If so, please send me PM.  Thanks!

Paul
